content: In verità, in quel momento non ho avuto la prima idea su tali discussioni: i legami familiari, i rapporti di sangue o qualsiasi altra cosa.
translations: eng:Truthfully, at that time, I didn't have the first idea about such talk﹕ family links, blood relations or whatever
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
